languages.text: "Что-то в атмосфере Тассеры влияет на человеческий мозг. Все, кто живет здесь, рано или поздно становится неуклюжим идиотом".
"There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."
languages.original_text: "Что-то в атмосфере Тассеры влияет на человеческий мозг. Все, кто живет здесь, рано или поздно становится неуклюжим идиотом".

traits.locale_text: "Something in Thassera's atmosphere has an influence on the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."
"Something in Thassera's atmosphere has an influence on the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."
"There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."
"There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."
"There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."
"There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."

languages.text: "In der Atmosphäre von Thassera liegt etwas, das das menschliche Gehirn verändert. Früher oder später wird jeder, der hier lebt, zum tollpatschigen Idioten."
languages.original_text: "There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."

traits.locale_text: "In der Atmosphäre von Thassera liegt etwas, das das menschliche Gehirn verändert. Früher oder später wird jeder, der hier lebt, zum tollpatschigen Idioten."

languages.text: « Il y a quelque chose dans l'atmosphère de Thassera qui altère le cerveau humain. Tôt ou tard, tous ceux qui vivent ici deviennent complètement idiots. »
languages.original_text: "There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a quelque chose dans l'atmosphère de Thassera qui altère le cerveau humain. Tôt ou tard, tous ceux qui vivent ici deviennent complètement idiots. »

languages.text: 「タッセーラの大気には、人間の脳に変化を及ぼす何かがある。遅かれ早かれ、ここに住む者は皆、不器用な間抜けになってしまうんだ」
languages.original_text: "There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラの大気には、人間の脳に変化を及ぼす何かがある。遅かれ早かれ、ここに住む者は皆、不器用な間抜けになってしまうんだ」

languages.text: «Hay algo en la atmósfera de Thassera que altera el cerebro humano. Tarde o temprano, todos sus habitantes se vuelven tontos y torpes».
languages.original_text: "There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."

traits.locale_text: «Hay algo en la atmósfera de Thassera que altera el cerebro humano. Tarde o temprano, todos sus habitantes se vuelven tontos y torpes».

languages.text: “我认为塔瑟拉的大气中存在某种物质，可以改变人的大脑。住在这颗行星上的人，迟早都会变成笨头笨脑的白痴。”
languages.original_text: "There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."

traits.locale_text: “我认为塔瑟拉的大气中存在某种物质，可以改变人的大脑。住在这颗行星上的人，迟早都会变成笨头笨脑的白痴。”

languages.text: "Thassera'nın atmosferinde insan beynini etkileyen bir şeyler var. Buradaki herkes, bir süre sonra beceriksiz birer aptala dönüşüyor."
languages.original_text: "There is something in Thassera's atmosphere that alters the human brain. Sooner or later, anyone who lives here becomes a clumsy idiot."

traits.locale_text: "Thassera'nın atmosferinde insan beynini etkileyen bir şeyler var. Bir süre sonra burada yaşayan herkes beceriksiz bir aptala dönüşüyor."
